data.text: @justindotnet @CDCgov As it turns out, redefining data to fit their needs means even less will be done to prevent the spread of this disease.
@HughAkstonPhD @KateGrassmeyer @justindotnet Don’t forget about the closed playgrounds
@KateGrassmeyer @justindotnet It will be harder to delete aiding and abetting 18 months of school closings from his record.

@HughAkstonPhD @justindotnet He deleted it. A lot of us will remember the insane hypocrisy of elected officials dunking on other elected officials who were following rules THEY set in place simply because they are in different political parties. But he deleted it nonetheless. 👍🏻
@HughAkstonPhD @justindotnet He deleted it a couple of weeks ago.

@TheAlextrifier @justindotnet @CDCgov Those highly vulnerable people are free to wear a mask - in fact the CDC recommends that high risk individuals continue to mask - one way masking w/n95s is more effective and better proetects the person wearing the mask.
@justindotnet Youngkin owns Alexandria.  Still hawking “read the room” T-shirts or did you delete that  tweet?
@justindotnet @CDCgov Let’s hope for the best. Folks in the ACPD were not happy. People are still highly vulnerable to this virus whether it’s the endemic or not.
